description:
Implement error boundary components that catch runtime errors and display friendly error messages with specific recovery actions, such as 'retry operation', 'view logs', or 'contact support'.

**Rationale:** Application crashes leave users confused and stranded. Helpful error messaging with next steps transforms a dead-end into a resolvable situation.
title: Error boundaries with recovery suggestions
